name: Ghoulie needs to Eat
description:
Entry for Trijam 42.

this actually was made in 3:30 hours so I guess it won't count.

Help Ghoulie, the friendly ghoul that needs to eat dinner. It is a well mannered creature and wouldn't eat living flesh, still villagers find disgusting that it eat their dear ones. Get to as many graves as you can. Good thing it can dig to escape them.

Controls
Move: WASD;       Dig: Hold SPACEBAR

Assets credits:

Grave Sprites: https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-medieval-village-decorations

Tileset: https://opengameart.org/content/the-mana-worldforest-tileset

Ghoulie and Dudes: me
